header.headline: Forms
header.subhead_a: Here you'll find all your Subscription Forms including the ones that are in draft, published or with unpublished changes. You currently have

no_forms.headline: Welcome to Forms!
no_forms.subhead:
Include a Subscription Form on your site, blog, landing page, Facebook Page or share it using a public URL.
Create your first Form and customize it just in minutes with our Editor!

forms_grid.delete_message: If you delete this Form, it'll also be erased from where it's published.
